title: HOW TO Use the NEW Longitude Features in MSFS Sim Update 16! (Tutorial) üéìüë®‚Äç‚úàÔ∏è
description:
Ready to take your Cessna Citation Longitude flights to the next level? Sim Update 16 has introduced some incredible new systems, and in this tutorial, we're breaking down exactly how to use them! This comprehensive guide will walk you through all the recent changes, including:

- Enhanced FMS Initialization: A step-by-step guide to the new pre-flight setup.
- Realistic Thrust Reverser Simulation: Detailed review on what has changed and how to use it
- Autothrottle Aural Alerts: Understand the new cockpit audio cues and the effect of them
- Cabin Altitude & Pressurization System: A detailed look at the new immersive cabin systems.

This is the ultimate resource for pilots looking to master the new Longitude features. Subscribe to the channel for more tutorials and hit the notification bell so you don't miss our next video! What other tutorials would you like to see? Comment below! üí¨
